```{python}
import pandas as pd
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
```

```{python}
csv_path = '/home/ndettmer/data/inat/metadata.csv'
df = pd.read_csv(csv_path)
```

```{python}
plt.figure()
df.distance.plot.kde()
plt.axvline(x=5, color='red')
plt.show()
```

```{python}
n_remaining = (df.distance >= 5).sum()
n_removed = len(df) - n_remaining
share_remaining = n_remaining / len(df) * 100
share_removed = 100 - share_remaining
```

```{python}
print(f"{n_remaining} samples fulfill the criteria. That is {share_remaining}% of the {len(df)} samples.")
```
